name: Major Miner
description:
Hope you enjoy the game made in 7 days, about a miner who's spaceship crashed and now he has to collect ore from around the cave to repair and upgrade the spaceship.

But beware enemies come at night, the enemies feed off of ore so you stealing their ore is you stealing their food!

The less ore remaining in the cave, the more enemies that will come to attack your base at night, so don't get too greedy!

Programming - Me - https://olliescottie2002.itch.io/
                               - I Be Pika - https://itch.io/profile/kidiot

All Art - Meleemaster

UI - Me - https://olliescottie2002.itch.io/

All music and SFX -https://zequals.itch.io /  www.ezequielclaverie.com
